synopsis.text: On the tropical island of Jambe, an introverted young boy named Subarna is gifted a magical crown. With the crown's power, Subarna begins performing heroic deeds and acts of kindness for the island people, earning their love and the moniker of "the people's hero". However, Prince Rupia, the heir to Jambe's throne, becomes enraged at Subarna's popularity. Consumed by jealousy, Rupia has Subarna unlawfully arrested, abusing his royal authority. As Subarna struggles against Rupia's tyranny, the magic crown remains his only ally against the prince's wrath. Will the kindhearted hero manage to win over the people's favor and secure his freedom? Or will the vengeful Rupia succeed in his ruthless quest for power?
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
